list.name: Changes
list.comment:
main.py Minor changes
main_test.py Refactored code: All face calculations moved to separate methods First failed try to calculate smiling value Removed unnecessary comments.
main_test2.py Copy of main_test Flask server functions implemented: Sending videostream on http request. Sending a stream of JSON string of face calculated values on http request.
main_test3 Copy of main_test2 All face calculation methods were moved to separate file module named "face_calculations"". Tcp client functions instead of flask implemented: Sending a stream of JSON string of face calculated values to tcp server.
face_calculations.py Separate module file with all face calculations created. Changed head Z rotation: Now using difference between Y and X axis of the eyes to find rotation angle.

task.summary:
Project from before using git. my_file_loader.py Implemented loading of dlib data files and test video file.
main_test.py Implemented face detection with openCV and dlib library. Implemented eyes closure computation by using Euclidean distance and aspect ratio. Implemented mouth closure computation by using it's height to width ratio Implemented computation of the face rotation by three axis X, Y, Z: For X using nose to left and right side of the face ratio For Y using from top nose side to chin ratio For Z using eyes distance and nose tip width ratio.
main.py Implemented face detection with openCV and dlib library. Implemented eyes closure computation by using Euclidean distance and aspect ratio. Implemented mouth closure computation by using it's height to width ratio Implemented video steaming to bites and sending it to the local host by using Flask server library

main_test.py Refactored code. Removed unnecessary comments. Changed mouth openness calculation: instead of np.linear function that used only x-axis or y-axis of mouth points, now dist.Euclidean function is using.

main.py Minor changes
main_test.py Refactored code: All face calculations moved to separate methods First failed try to calculate smiling value Removed unnecessary comments.
main_test2.py Copy of main_test Flask server functions implemented: Sending videostream on http request. Sending a stream of JSON string of face calculated values on http request.
main_test3 Copy of main_test2 All face calculation methods were moved to separate file module named "face_calculations"". Tcp client functions instead of flask implemented: Sending a stream of JSON string of face calculated values to tcp server.
face_calculations.py Separate module file with all face calculations created. Changed head Z rotation: Now using difference between Y and X axis of the eyes to find rotation angle.

Implemented mouth closure computation by using it's height to width ratio Implemented video steaming to bites and sending it to the local host by using Flask server library
